pluggable.name: FileMan
pluggable.author: Matt-SD
pluggable.description: A File Manager for Habari and nothing else.

help.value:
Chose the file to edit in the browser on the right and the file's content will be displayed in the textarea on the left for editing.
If the File is not writable, open your FTP client and set the file to be writable.
Saving files is done with AJAX and any errors will be returned and displayed in the Status bit.
